name: Hotel St. Antoner Hof

reviews.text: This was our third time staying here and i have to say this year was better than ever. The staff are just so friendly and helpfull.
reviews.title: Very very good

reviews.text: Rooms were lovely and whilst the hotel is slightly out of the centre of town -its only so by about a two minute walk so really not worth worrying about. Anyway they have a very nice complimentary car service to take you where you want in the resort if you need it.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel, with good food and frindly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Food was very good although the 8 course dinner can seem a bit much after a full day skiing! No idea why they dont swap that for a simpler menu (that would be quicker to serve.)
reviews.title: Decent & somewhat overrated

reviews.text: All in a great experience and we look forward to returning again.
reviews.title: Simply the best st Anton has to offer!

reviews.text: We have for 5 years in a row held our skiing holiday at St. Antoner Hof.The decoration of the hotel is a mix of old fashioned wood panelling and modern comfort with a very pleasant result. The food is delicious and the staff friendly. It is not only a nice place to stay, but must also be a nice place to work, as the staff is there each year.
reviews.title: What a wonderful hotel with tremendous gracious staff

reviews.text: Great hotel. Fantastic location with great staff. I lead a client trip there and the staff really could not have helped us any more. Superb facilities. Highly recommended.
reviews.title: Brilliant

description: The “RAFFL'S ST. ANTONER HOF” is situated in the centre of St. Anton, just behind the pedestrian area, about a 3 minutes walk from the ski runs. Our ski depot is at INTERSPORT ARLBERG, directly at the lifts. There you can store skis and boots free of charge. There, ski hire is possible too. We certainly also will arrange the ski passes for you, so that you don’t have to do anything.
